document.full_text: yemen's president has made a new offer to protesters demanding his ouster, proposing he stays in office until elections are held but transferring his powers to a caretaker government, an opposition source said on wednesday.
document.title: yemen's saleh makes new offer: opposition snub it
lines_and_colors: yemen's president has made a new offer to protesters demanding his ouster, proposing he stays in office until elections are held but transferring his powers to a caretaker government, an opposition source said on wednesday.
